一个灵活易用的 LLM 路由框架：RouteLLM
RouteLLM解决了大模型性能强价格贵，价格便宜但性能弱的问题，其能够在推理过程中动态选择更强或更弱的LLM，做到降低成本的同时不影响质量

在MT Bench基准上成本降低 85%，同时可以达到 95% 的 GPT-4 性能

功能:
1、替代OpenAI
190e1066baa11125.post_content_en:
AIGCLINK (@aigclink) posted at 3:48 AM on Tue, Jul 23, 2024:
A flexible and easy-to-use LLM routing framework: RouteLLM
RouteLLM addresses the issue of high-performance but expensive large models versus cheap but weak models. It dynamically selects stronger or weaker LLMs during inference, reducing costs without compromising quality.

On the MT Bench benchmark, costs are reduced by 85%, while achieving 95% of GPT-4's performance.

Features:
1. Replacement for OpenAI
190e1066baa11125.post_summary_cn: RouteLLM是一个灵活易用的LLM路由框架，解决了大模型性能强价格贵的问题，能在推理过程中动态选择LLM，降低成本同时不影响质量。在MT Bench基准上成本降低85%，达到95%的GPT-4性能。
190e1066baa11125.post_summary_en: RouteLLM is a flexible and easy-to-use LLM routing framework that addresses the issue of high-performance but expensive large models. It dynamically selects LLMs during inference, reducing costs without compromising quality. On the MT Bench benchmark, costs are reduced by 85%, achieving 95% of GPT-4's performance.

嵌入数据库是向量索引、图网络和关系数据库的结合体，这使得可以使用 SQL 进行向量搜索、主题建模、RAG 等。
它可以独立存在，或者作为 LLM prompts 的强大知识源。

🗒txtai 功能总结

🗒txtai  @neumll  8.3k✨

txtai is an all-in-one embeddings database for semantic search, LLM orchestration, and workflows.

An embeddings database is a combination of vector indexing, graph networks, and relational databases, enabling vector search, topic modeling, RAG, and more using SQL.
It can exist independently or serve as a powerful knowledge source for LLM prompts.

🗒txtai feature summary

从 LLM 到 LRM: OpenAI O1 模型在 PlanBench 上的规划能力评估

最新 LLMs 仍然无法规划, 大型推理模型 (LRM, OpenAI o1) 可以吗? 一起看看 👇

LLMs 的规划表现:
- 最新的 LLMs 在普通 Blocksworld 上有所进步, 最佳模型 (LLaMA 3.1 405B) 达到 62.5% 的准确率
- 但在混淆版本 (Mystery Blocksworld)
19221f2c71f8d36e.post_content_en:
meng shao (@shao__meng) posted at 4:54 PM on Mon, Sep 23, 2024:
From LLM to LRM: Evaluation of OpenAI O1 Model's Planning Capability on PlanBench

Latest LLMs still cannot plan, can large reasoning models (LRM, OpenAI o1) do it? Let's take a look 👇

Planning performance of LLMs:
- The latest LLMs have made progress on the standard Blocksworld, with the best model (LLaMA 3.1 405B) achieving 62.5% accuracy
- But on the confusing version (Mystery Blocksworld)
19221f2c71f8d36e.post_summary_cn: meng shao 讨论了从 LLM 到 LRM 的转变，特别是 OpenAI O1 模型在 PlanBench 上的规划能力评估。最新的 LLMs 在普通 Blocksworld 上有所进步，但在混淆版本上表现不佳。
19221f2c71f8d36e.post_summary_en: meng shao discussed the transition from LLM to LRM, specifically evaluating the planning capability of the OpenAI O1 model on PlanBench. The latest LLMs have improved on the standard Blocksworld but perform poorly on the confusing version.
